Title: Relates to a period of probable usefulness for the lease of a parking garage by the city of White Plains
Summary: Provides a period of probable usefulness for the financing of a leasehold interest in a certain parking garage by the city of White Plains, of twenty years.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to providing a period of probable usefulness for a leasehold interest in the major portion of the parking garage building located at 237 Martine Avenue in the city of White Plains
